title: Elliptical orbits
creator_credit: Educational Services, Kevin Smith and Norton Bloom
brief_description: Starting with an elliptic orbit (as of a satellite) and using Kepler’s law of areas, shows that the gravitational force on the satellite obeys an inverse square relation. The derivation is almost entirely geometric in nature.
creator_credit_for_label: Educational Services, Kevin Smith and Norton Bloom
